content.d: That’s right! Lanzhu heard that you love dynamic activities like bungee jumping and aerial trapezing from a helicopter!
So, we’re going to have a thrilling day together! 𝅘𝅥𝅮
Wonderful!! What are we gonna be doing together!?
That’s still a secret. The hint is that harness. 𝅘𝅥𝅮
What a great surprise! I’m down for anything~!
